title: Office of the Director | NIST
snippet: Learn more about NIST's current strategic priorities. ... Craig Burkhardt was appointed to serve as the Deputy Under Secretary of Commerce for Standards and Technology and NIST Deputy Director in January 2025.

title: ANSI Appoints NIST Director as New CEO
snippet: National Institute of Standards and Technology Director Laurie Locascio will step down in early 2025 to serve as the new president and CEO of the American National Standards Institute.

title: NIST Organization Structure | NIST
snippet: Chief of Staff Jason Boehm · Public Affairs Jennifer Huergo · Program Coordination Christopher Szakal (Acting) International & Academic Affairs Magdalena Navarro · Congressional & Legislative Affairs Catherine "Cate" Johnson · Management and Organization Amy Egan (Acting) Created May 27, 2009, Updated September 22, 2025 ·
